name: Ultimate Member & Job Manager
author: SuitePlugins

sections.description:
This plugin integrates WP Job Manager and its extensions into your Ultimate Member user profiles.

This plugin needs Ultimate Member and WP Job Manager to be installed!

Ultimate Member Job Manager is compatible with the following WP Job Manager extensions:
Applications, Bookmarks and Job Alerts.

A separate tab will be available in the user profile for every installed extension.

Pro Version

  • Integrates with the following:
  • WP Job Manager – Applications
  • WP Job Manager – Resume Manager
  • WP Job Manager – Bookmarks
  • WP Job Manager – Job Alerts.

Visit the following link for more pro features:
[https://suiteplugins.com/downloads/wp-job-manager-ultimate-member/?utm_source=wprepo&utm_medium=link&utm_campaign=um_job_manager](Pro Version)
sections.installation:
This very simple like other wordpress plugin:
1. Upload the plugin to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.changelog:
1.0.0

  • First Release

1.0.1

  • Plugin adapted by https://suiteplugins.com/?utm_source=wprepo&utm_medium=link&utm_campaign=um_job_manager
  • Codebase updated for Ultimate Member version 2
  • Codebase updated for WordPress 5
  • Language file added

1.0.1.1

  • New: Language can now be updated in WorPress
  • Fixed: “Use of undefined constant __return_false – assumed” error fixed
  • Tested on WordPress 5.2.3 and WP Job Manager 1.34.0

1.0.1.2

  • Fixed: Quick fix to breaking changes from latest WP Job Manager update
